医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了南非医护人员在大流行期间使用的应对机制加州大学伯克利分校人类学教授 Andrew Wooyoung Kim 的一项新研究揭示了南非约翰内斯堡都会区的医护人员在 COVID-19 大流行期间使用的弹性应对机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-reveals-coping-mechanisms-used-by-South-African-healthcare-workers-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-reveals-coping-mechanisms-used-by-South-African-healthcare-workers-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84a553ea-c1e6-4060-b03d-e6224ac85170 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 00:14:04 -0400 Study reveals coping mechanisms used by South African healthcare workers during the pandemic
外周肿瘤生物标志物指导 HPV 相关恶性肿瘤的治疗2023 年 8 月 10 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的综述论文，题为“肿瘤负荷的外周替代物指导 HPV 相关恶性肿瘤的化疗和免疫治疗策略”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Peripheral-tumor-biomarkers-to-guide-treatment-for-HPV-linked-malignancies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Peripheral-tumor-biomarkers-to-guide-treatment-for-HPV-linked-malignancies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53949769-6e67-4b65-86d3-ecbba87cd27b Mon, 14 Aug 2023 23:08:34 -0400 Peripheral tumor biomarkers to guide treatment for HPV-associated malignancies
溶瘤病毒可用于“加热”冷肿瘤并改善免疫治疗匹兹堡大学和 UPMC 领导的《实验医学杂志》上的一项新研究表明，为感染癌症或溶瘤病毒配备抑制肿瘤的基因货物可以刺激免疫系统，并有助于免疫疗法缩小或完全清除小鼠的侵袭性肿瘤研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Oncolytic-viruses-could-be-used-to-warm-up-cold-tumors-and-improve-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Oncolytic-viruses-could-be-used-to-warm-up-cold-tumors-and-improve-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6dcbdc3-51d1-4b9a-856f-ad5c6a638c15 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:56:59 -0400 Oncolytic viruses could be used to 'warm up' cold tumors and improve immunotherapy
PSMA PET/CT 无需活检即可诊断老年患者晚期前列腺癌对于疑似前列腺癌的老年患者，PSMA PET/CT 可以诊断晚期疾病并帮助选择治疗方法，而无需进行活检。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/PSMA-PETCT-can-diagnose-advanced-prostate-cancer-in-elderly-病人-without-biopsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/PSMA-PETCT-can-diagnose-advanced-prostate-cancer-in-elderly-病人-without-biopsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6288b3d-29bd-4c2f-9a85-fd2d31d20ad5 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:44:43 -0400 PSMA PET/CT can diagnose advanced prostate cancer in elderly patients without biopsy
结合自上而下和自下而上的方法来深入了解生命的起源尽管取得了几十年的进步，生命起源仍然是科学中尚未解决的重大问题之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Pairing-top-down-and-bottom-up-approaches-to-gain-insights-into-the-origin-of-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Pairing-top-down-and-bottom-up-approaches-to-gain-insights-into-the-origin-of-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e706a6df-35ee-4029-81e8-b7f5f4fde085 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:37:33 -0400 Pairing top-down and bottom-up approaches to gain insights into the origin of life
研究找到逆转内耳细胞基因沉默的方法失聪的成年人无法恢复听力，因为内耳的感觉听觉细胞在受损后无法再生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-finds-way-to-reverse-gene-silencing-in-inner-ear-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-finds-way-to-reverse-gene-silencing-in-inner-ear-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=156bbcc4-674a-4f36-bbfe-9a4b72a9e548 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:04:00 -0400 Study finds way to reverse gene silencing in inner ear cells
干细胞用于制造分泌牙釉质蛋白的类器官现在，干细胞已经制造出了类器官，可以分泌形成牙釉质的蛋白质，牙釉质是保护牙齿免受损伤和腐烂的物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Stem-cells-used-to-create-organoids-that-secret-dental-enamel- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Stem-cells-used-to-create-organoids-that-secret-dental-enamel- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd92cb72-2708-4920-bc5d-8a99403233e1 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:54:26 -0400 Stem cells used to create organoids that secrete dental enamel proteins
深部脑刺激显示出中风后康复的希望克利夫兰诊所研究人员对中风后康复患者进行的首次深部脑刺激 (DBS) 人体试验表明，使用 DBS 来瞄准齿状核——调节随意运动、认知、语言和感觉的精细控制大脑的功能——安全且可行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-post-中风-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-post-中风-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3f5f2e0-9801-4504-b43c-d8e5eed29d18 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:42:22 -0400 Deep brain stimulation shows promise for post-stroke rehabilitation
野火、农业和农业排放可能对认知健康构成有毒威胁密歇根大学的最新研究表明，再多的空气污染对大脑都没有好处，但野火和农业产生的排放物尤其可能对认知健康造成特别有毒的威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Wildfires-emissions-from-agriculture-and-farming-may-pose-有毒-threats-to-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Wildfires-emissions-from-agriculture-and-farming-may-pose-known-threats-to-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8946c8c5-a7b9-4bad-81b9-d3d3bf403d04 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:38:33 -0400 Wildfires, emissions from agriculture and farming may pose toxic threats to cognitive health
研究发现前列腺癌致命肿瘤转换的新机制密歇根大学罗格尔癌症中心的一项研究发现了一种新机制，可以解释为什么一些前列腺肿瘤从常见的、可治疗的形式转变为更罕见和更具侵袭性的前列腺癌形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-discovers-new-mechanism-for-deadly-tumor-switch-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-discovers-new-mechanism-for-deadly-tumor-switch-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94ef59d1-404b-420b-9b5f-76bfd2b321c0 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:27:49 -0400 Study discovers new mechanism for deadly tumor switch in prostate cancer
